Title: Propaganda directed to the foreign enemy at the front line teaching materials
Publisher: Nanjing Military Region Political Department Liaison Department (南京军区政治部联络部)
Notes: English and Russian phrases to be used against American and Russian soldiers at the front:Give up, no harm. We are kind to captives. Hands up! Come out! Don't move! Follow me!In red, above, a Mao quotation.
